name: Zombie Waiting
description: Many years ago people and trolls had lived with peace in the world. Until the zombie virus spreads...
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-bit, Windows 7 Processor: Dual core 1.5 GHz processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB dedicated VRAM or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound
